meanings.sent1: The unskilful painter often mixed up colors.
meanings.sent2: She was unskilful at playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The unskilful chef mistook salt for sugar in the cake recipe.
meanings.sent4: His unskilful attempts at fixing the car only made it worse.
meanings.sent5: The unskilful dancer tripped over her own feet during the performance.

meanings.definition: Not possessing the necessary abilities or knowledge
meanings.sent1: The unskilful student struggled with the math problems.
meanings.sent2: He felt unskilful when faced with the complex machinery.
meanings.sent3: The unskilful driver took the wrong turn multiple times.
meanings.sent4: Her unskilful handling of the situation led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The unskilful gardener accidentally pruned the flowers instead of the bushes.
